text: Aspergillus heterothallicus is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. It is from the Usti section. The species was first described in 1965.Raper, K.B.; Fennell, D.I. 1965. The Genus Aspergillus. :1-686 It has been reported to produce emethallicins, emeheterone, emesterones A & B, 5’-hydroxyaveranthin, stellatin, and sterigmatocystin. ==Growth and morphology== A. heterothallicus has been cultivated on both Czapek yeast extract agar (CYA) plates and Malt Extract Agar Oxoid® (MEAOX) plates. The growth morphology of the colonies can be seen in the pictures below. Aspergillus_heterothallicus_cya.png|Aspergillus heterothallicus growing on CYA plate Aspergillus_heterothallicus_meaox.png|Aspergillus heterothallicus growing on MEAOX plate == References == heterothallicus Category:Fungi described in 1965
title: Aspergillus heterothallicus
